comparison.confirm.navigateToSpecialText: You are about to leave this page and navigate to the Special Text configuration page. Any unsaved changes will be lost. Do you want to continue?
comparison.confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the plan "{{name}}"?
comparison.confirm.clearResults: Are you sure you want to clear all results for "{{name}}"?
comparison.error.rulesRequired: At least one rule is required
comparison.error.propertyRequired: All rules must have a property selected
comparison.empty.description: Create a comparison plan to find duplicate or similar resources
comparison.empty.noRules: No rules defined. Add at least one rule.
comparison.empty.noFilters: No filters configured (will compare all resources)
comparison.label.name: Name
comparison.hint.viewResourcesInMainPage: You can view these resources on the main resource page by searching with their IDs
comparison.hint.rerunAfterEdit: After editing resource information, you need to re-execute the comparison plan to generate new results
comparison.hint.configureRulesAfterCreat: You can configure rules and filters in the plan details after creation
comparison.mode.strictEqual.description: Binary score: 1 if exactly equal, 0 otherwise. E.g. 4 vs 4 → 1, 4 vs 5 → 0
comparison.mode.normalizedText.descripti: Compare after ignoring case, spaces and special characters
comparison.mode.textSimilarity.descripti: Character-level Jaccard similarity (0~1). E.g. 'abc' vs 'abd' → intersection {a,b}/union {a,b,c,d} = 0.5
comparison.mode.regexExtractNumber.descr: Extract numbers using regex (e.g. 'v1', 'ep2', '第3') and compare. Binary score: 1 if equal, 0 otherwise
comparison.mode.fixedTolerance.descripti: Binary score: 1 if |difference| ≤ tolerance, 0 otherwise. E.g. tolerance=1: 4 vs 5 → 1 (diff=1), 4 vs 6 → 0 (diff=2)
comparison.mode.relativeTolerance.descri: Binary score: 1 if |difference|/max ≤ percent, 0 otherwise. E.g. 20%: 4 vs 5 → 1 (1/5=20%), 4 vs 6 → 0 (2/6=33%)
comparison.mode.subset.description: Binary score: 1 if A⊆B or B⊆A, 0 otherwise. E.g. {A,B} vs {A,B,C} → 1, {A,B} vs {B,C} → 0
comparison.mode.timeWindow.description: Binary score: 1 if time difference ≤ window, 0 otherwise. E.g. window=24h: 12h apart → 1, 36h apart → 0
comparison.mode.sameDay.description: Binary score: 1 if same calendar date, 0 otherwise. E.g. 2024-01-01 10:00 vs 2024-01-01 22:00 → 1
comparison.mode.extensionMap.description: Compares file extension distribution (0~1). E.g. [.jpg,.jpg,.png] vs [.jpg,.png,.png] → distribution similarity
comparison.nullBehavior.skip.description: Skip this rule, does not affect final score
comparison.description.filters: Optional, narrow down the resources to compare. If not set, all resources will be compared
comparison.description.rules: Required, define criteria for determining resource similarity
comparison.description.execute: Run comparison task and view results
comparison.description.executeDisabledNo: Please add at least one rule first
comparison.description.threshold: Resources with total score ≥ this threshold are considered similar/duplicate
comparison.description.weight: Weight coefficient of this rule in the total score
comparison.description.isVeto: If enabled and this rule scores below threshold, the overall match fails
comparison.description.vetoThreshold: Minimum score threshold to trigger veto
comparison.description.normalize: Normalize text before comparison (ignore case, spaces and special characters)
comparison.description.oneNullBehavior: How to handle when one resource has null value for this property
comparison.description.bothNullBehavior: How to handle when both resources have null values for this property
comparison.description.tolerance: Maximum allowed absolute difference. E.g. tolerance=1: values 4 and 5 match (diff=1)
comparison.description.tolerancePercent: Maximum allowed relative difference (0~1). E.g. 0.2 means 20%: values 4 and 5 match (1/5=20%)
comparison.description.windowHours: Maximum allowed time difference in hours. E.g. 24: times within 24 hours match
comparison.description.regexPattern: Custom regex pattern to extract numbers. Leave empty to use built-in patterns (e.g. v1, ep2, #3)
comparison.scoring.title: Scoring Explanation
comparison.scoring.formula: Total = Σ(Rule Score × Rule Weight) / Σ(Rule Weight) × 100%
comparison.scoring.ruleScore: Each rule calculates a score between 0~1 based on its comparison mode
comparison.scoring.weightedSum: Rule scores are multiplied by their weights, summed, then divided by total weight for weighted average
comparison.scoring.threshold: When Total Score ≥ Threshold, two resources are considered similar/duplicate
comparison.scoring.example: Example: Rule A (weight 2) scores 0.8, Rule B (weight 1) scores 0.6, Total = (0.8×2 + 0.6×1) / (2+1) × 100% = 73.3%
comparison.networkGraph.title: Resource Relationship Graph
comparison.networkGraph.hint: Only relationships with similarity above the plan threshold are shown. Hover over a connection to see detailed comparison.
